title: Curse of the Empty Lord

properties.value: Curse of the Empty Lord is a miniquest following the events of Desert Treasure, allowing the player to obtain a set of ghostly robes.

content:
The RuneScape Wiki also has an article on: rsw:The Curse of Zaros
The wiki defaults to the British convention for floor numbering: Ground floor, first floor, etc. This may be changed by clicking the moon icon at the top right of the site.
Curse of the Empty Lord
Released 26 July 2005 (Update)
Members Yes
Quest series Mahjarrat
Developer(s) James B

Curse of the Empty Lord is a miniquest following the events of Desert Treasure, allowing the player to obtain a set of ghostly robes.

Contents

  • 1 Details
  • 2 Walkthrough
    • 2.1 Valdez the Explorer
    • 2.2 Sequence 1
    • 2.3 Sequence 2
    • 2.4 Sequence 3
  • 3 Reward
  • 4 Required for completing
  • 5 Transcript
  • 6 Changes
  • 7 Trivia

Details[edit | edit source]

Start point Talk to the Mysterious ghost (Valdez) near Glarial's Tomb.
Official difficultyExperienced
DescriptionFollow the sad tale of woe from one cursed soul to the next and learn more of Zamorak's betrayal of Zaros.
Official lengthMedium
Requirements
  • Started Desert Treasure and The Restless Ghost
    • Requires 53 Thieving (not boostable) to obtain the Ring of visibility
  • Some players will need 31 Prayer (not boostable)
Items required
  • Ring of visibility
  • Ghostspeak amulet (Morytania legs 2 or higher may be used instead, except when otherwise noted)
  • Some players may need 5 coins to purchase a Shantay pass
  • Knife or Slash Weapon for the Lava Maze
Recommended
  • 50 Combat level
  • Various teleportation runes and/or jewellery
  • Stamina potions can be used to preserve run energy; this is especially useful when in the Wilderness.
Enemies to defeat None
Ironman concerns
  • You may need to visit Entrana
  • You will need to go into the Wilderness. To make this somewhat safer you can also do this in f2p worlds.

To make this somewhat safer you can also do this in [[f2p]] worlds.","items":"*[[Ring of visibility]]\n*[[Ghostspeak amulet]] ([[Morytania legs 2]] or higher may be used instead, except when otherwise noted)\n*Some players may need 5 [[coins]] to purchase a [[Shantay pass (item)|Shantay pass]]\n*[[Knife]] or Slash Weapon for the Lava Maze"}

Walkthrough[edit | edit source]

Warning: This miniquest will take people into dangerous parts of the Wilderness. Beware of player killers and that you cannot teleport after level 20 Wilderness unless you use a piece of dragonstone teleport jewellery (such as an Amulet of glory), Slayer ring or Royal seed pod, with which you may teleport until level 30.

Note: It is possible to receive multiple pieces of the Ghostly set by talking to any ghost after they tell their story. You can get any of the pieces you have already gotten from any of the ghosts you have already spoken to.

Valdez the Explorer[edit | edit source]

Wearing your ring of visibility and your ghostspeak amulet or Morytania legs 2/3/4, go to Glarial's Tomb (not the waterfall cave) north-west of the Fishing Guild. The ghost is standing outside the tomb entrance. Note he will not appear as a dot on the minimap and his transparency makes him a bit tough to spot.

When you speak to him, he will introduce himself and relate his part of the story. He will then give you a Ghostly robe (top) and request you to find another ghost named Rennard, along with a hint on how to find him. Pay attention to the hint given, as it indicates the sequence necessary to complete the quest:

  • If he mentions pirates and a shipwreck, Sequence 1 must be followed for the entirety of the quest.
  • If he mentions the thief being northeast of there, Sequence 2 must be followed for the entirety of the quest.
  • If he mentions the thief being southeast of there, Sequence 3 must be followed for the entirety of the quest.

One must visit the ghosts in the correct order. Additionally, all of the Mysterious ghosts in this quest appear at all three of their possible locations, but the player will not be able to progress further in the quest until the ghost is spoken to at the correct location.

Sequence 1[edit | edit source]

Recommended Items:

  • Burning Amulet (teleport to Lava Maze)
  • Necklace of passage (teleport to Wizards' Tower)
  • Rennard can be found near the shipwrecked ship between the Wilderness Agility Course and Pirates' Hideout in level 52 Wilderness. Once spoken to, he will give the Ghostly gloves.
  • Kharrim can be found at the Chaos Temple (hut) altar in Level 38 Wilderness north of The Forgotten Cemetery. Once spoken to, he will give the Ghostly boots.
    • Use the Lava Maze burning amulet teleport, the closest place to teleport from is the cave safe area from the Mage Arena which also has a bank.
  • Lennissa can be found at the church on Entrana. (Bring a Ghostspeak amulet and not Morytania legs, as they are armour and not allowed on the island). Once spoken to, she will give the Ghostly robe (bottom).
  • Dhalak can be found at the Wizards' Tower ground floor[UK]1st floor[US]. Once spoken to, he will give the Ghostly hood.
  • Viggora can be found upstairs at the Rogues' Castle, on the 1st floor[UK]2nd floor[US], in level 52-56 Wilderness, in the small easternmost room with a Bronze sq shield spawn (beware of the Chaos Elemental and PKers). Once spoken to, he will give the Ghostly cloak.

Sequence 2[edit | edit source]

Recommended Items:

  • Burning Amulet (teleport to Bandit Camp and Chaos Temple)
  • Explorer Ring (Teleport to Port Sarim Docks, Mini-game Teleport to Rat Catchers or glory to Draynor Village works as well)
  • Combat Bracelet, Skull sceptre, Amulet of Glory, Varrock teleport (To get to Edgeville Monastery)
  • Slayer Ring, Salve graveyard teleport, Kharyrll Teleport, Ectophial, Fairy Ring code CKS (Slayer tower 1st floor[UK]2nd floor[US])
  • Ring of Dueling (Ferox Enclave then run to Graveyard of Shadows)
  • Rennard can be found at the Bandit Camp (Wilderness) near the shops. If you are having trouble speaking to him without getting attacked by the Bandits, you can try to lure them into the nearby food store and shut the door. Once spoken to, he will give the Ghostly gloves.
  • Kharrim can be found at the Graveyard of Shadows (Carrallangar), typically near the southern tomb within the graveyard. He will give the Ghostly boots.
  • Lennissa can be found at the Port Sarim docks at the Lady Lumbridge. Once spoken to, she will give the Ghostly robe (bottom).
  • Dhalak can be found at the Edgeville Monastery, upstairs by the altar (level 31 Prayer required). Once spoken to, he will give the Ghostly hood.
  • Viggora can be found at the Slayer Tower in Canifis, on the 1st floor[UK]2nd floor[US] near the southeast stairwell by the entrance to the Infernal Mages. Once spoken to, he will give the Ghostly cloak.

Sequence 3[edit | edit source]

(Recommended items: A Shantay pass, Falador teleport tabs or runes, Amulet of glory for teleporting to Al Kharid and Edgeville, Burning amulet for teleporting to the Lava Maze, 200 coins for a carpet ride, slash weapon for Lava Maze) Note: Open the Muddy chest in the Lava Maze to complete a task in the medium Wilderness diary (requires Muddy Key).

  • Rennard can be found in the Bandit Camp (Kharidian Desert) in the bar on the western side of the camp. Note that players training here may be standing on the NPC. Once spoken to, he will give the Ghostly gloves.
  • Kharrim can be found at the end of the Lava Maze inside the second fenced in area. Bring a slash weapon or knife to cut through the webs. Once spoken to, he will give the Ghostly boots.
  • Lennissa can be found at the west side of Tree Gnome Stronghold, directly south of the centre of the Gnome Ball Field along the outer edge of the fence. Once spoken to, she will give the Ghostly robe (bottom).
  • Dhalak can be found at the Falador Party Room, upstairs on the eastern side. Once spoken to, he will give the Ghostly hood.
  • Viggora can be found in the Edgeville Dungeon near the earth warriors in the northernmost room. The earth warriors can be rather annoying, but with some luck, you can trap them behind the ghost with you on the other side; you must talk to Viggora as soon as this happens and click through the first dialogue window to make this effect permanent for the whole chat. Once spoken to, he will give the Ghostly cloak.

Reward[edit | edit source]

  • Ghostly hood
  • Ghostly robe (top)
  • Ghostly robe (bottom)
  • Ghostly gloves
  • Ghostly boots
  • Ghostly cloak

Upon completion, you can talk to Historian Minas on the 1st floor[UK]2nd floor[US] of the Varrock Museum to receive 10 kudos and an experience lamp worth 10,000 experience in any skill above 50.

A male player wearing the ghostly robes.

Required for completing[edit | edit source]

Completion of Curse of the Empty Lord is required for the following:

  • The General's Shadow

Transcript[edit | edit source]

This article on a quest has an associated dialogue page.
Click here for a transcript of possible conversations encountered throughout the quest.

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
9 April 2015
(update)

Gravingas & the Ghosts from the Curse of Zaros miniquest now recognize the Morytania legs built-in ghostspeak function.

Trivia[edit | edit source]

  • If you speak to any of the ghosts without a ghostspeak amulet, you may say "All your base are belong to us", as well as some other quotes. These are references to famous translation errors in the game Zero Wing.
  • When speaking to Rennard, your player says "I ain't scared of no ghost," a reference to "I ain't afraid of no ghost" from the Ghostbusters theme song.
  • While talking to Dhalak, he will ask if you are the "mighty sorcerer that binds him". If you are level 99 Magic, your character will respond by bragging about said skill mastery.
  • Talk to the first mysterious ghost at Glarial's tomb if you lose any of the ghostly item after quest.
  • The ghosts located in Wilderness also appear in free-to-play worlds, as long as the player has the ring of visibility and ghostspeak amulet equipped; A player can still talk to them and receive pieces of the ghostly clothing, but it will be labeled as a members object.
  • You are able to speak to the three different ghosts of Rennard from the three sequences. If you talk to the wrong one, short and funny dialogues will occur with the ghost.
v • d • e

'''Curse of the Empty Lord''' is a [[miniquest]] following the events of [[Desert Treasure]], allowing the player to obtain a set of [[ghostly robes]].

==Details==
{{Quest details
|start = Talk to the Mysterious ghost ([[Valdez]]) near [[Glarial's Tomb]].
|description = Follow the sad tale of woe from one cursed soul to the next and learn more of Zamorak's betrayal of Zaros.
|length = Medium
|requirements = *Started [[Desert Treasure]] and [[The Restless Ghost]]
**Requires {{SCP|Thieving|53|link=yes}} {{Boostable|no}} to obtain the [[Ring of visibility]]
*Some players will need {{SCP|Prayer|31|link=yes}} {{Boostable|no}}
|items = *[[Ring of visibility]]
*[[Ghostspeak amulet]] ([[Morytania legs 2]] or higher may be used instead, except when otherwise noted)
*Some players may need 5 [[coins]] to purchase a [[Shantay pass (item)|Shantay pass]]
*[[Knife]] or Slash Weapon for the Lava Maze

|recommended = 
*{{SCP|Combat|50|link=yes}}
*Various teleportation runes and/or jewellery
*[[Stamina potion]]s can be used to preserve [[run energy]]; this is especially useful when in the [[Wilderness]].
|ironman = * [[File:Ultimate ironman chat badge.png]] You may need to visit [[Entrana]]
* [[File:Hardcore ironman chat badge.png]] You will need to go into the [[Wilderness]]. To make this somewhat safer you can also do this in [[f2p]] worlds.
|difficulty=Experienced}}

==Walkthrough==
'''Warning:''' This [[miniquest]] will take people into dangerous parts of the [[Wilderness]]. '''Beware of player killers''' and that you cannot teleport after level 20 Wilderness unless you use a piece of dragonstone teleport jewellery (such as an [[Amulet of glory]]), [[Slayer ring]] or [[Royal seed pod]], with which you may teleport until level 30.

'''Note:''' It is possible to receive multiple pieces of the Ghostly set by talking to any ghost after they tell their story. You can get any of the pieces you have already gotten from any of the ghosts you have already spoken to.

===[[Valdez]] the Explorer===
Wearing your [[ring of visibility]] and your [[ghostspeak amulet]] or [[Morytania legs 2]]/[[Morytania legs 3|3]]/[[Morytania legs 4|4]], go to [[Glarial's Tomb]] (''not the waterfall cave'') north-west of the [[Fishing Guild]]. The ghost is standing outside the tomb entrance. Note he will not appear as a dot on the minimap and his transparency makes him a bit tough to spot.

When you speak to him, he will introduce himself and relate his part of the story. He will then give you a [[Ghostly robe (top)]] and request you to find another ghost named [[Rennard]], along with a hint on how to find him. '''Pay attention to the hint given''', as it indicates the sequence necessary to complete the quest:

*If he mentions ''pirates and a shipwreck'', '''Sequence 1''' must be followed for the entirety of the quest.
*If he mentions the thief being ''northeast'' of there, '''Sequence 2''' must be followed for the entirety of the quest.
*If he mentions the thief being ''southeast'' of there, '''Sequence 3''' must be followed for the entirety of the quest.

'''One must visit the ghosts in the correct order.''' Additionally, all of the [[Mysterious ghost]]s in this quest appear at all three of their possible locations, but the player will not be able to progress further in the quest until the ghost is spoken to at the correct location.

===Sequence 1===
Recommended Items:

*[[Burning amulet|Burning Amulet]] (teleport to [[Lava Maze]])
*[[Necklace of passage]] (teleport to [[Wizards' Tower]])
{{Checklist|
*[[Rennard]] can be found near the shipwrecked ship between the [[Wilderness Agility Course]] and [[Pirates' Hideout]] in level 52 Wilderness. Once spoken to, he will give the [[Ghostly gloves]].
*[[Kharrim]] can be found at the [[Chaos Temple (hut)]] altar in Level 38 [[Wilderness]] north of [[The Forgotten Cemetery]]. Once spoken to, he will give the [[Ghostly boots]].
**Use the [[Lava Maze]] burning amulet teleport, the closest place to teleport from is the cave safe area from the [[Mage Arena]] which also has a bank.
*[[Lennissa]] can be found at the church on [[Entrana]]. (Bring a [[Ghostspeak amulet]] and not [[Morytania legs 2|Morytania legs]], as they are armour and not allowed on the island). Once spoken to, she will give the [[Ghostly robe (bottom)]].
*[[Dhalak]] can be found at the [[Wizards' Tower]] {{FloorNumber|uk=0}}. Once spoken to, he will give the [[Ghostly hood]].
*[[Viggora]] can be found upstairs at the [[Rogues' Castle]], on the {{FloorNumber|uk=1}}, in level 52-56 [[Wilderness]], in the small easternmost room with a [[Bronze sq shield]] spawn (beware of the [[Chaos Elemental]] and [[Player killing|PKers]]). Once spoken to, he will give the [[Ghostly cloak]].
}}

===Sequence 2===
Recommended Items:

*Burning Amulet (teleport to [[Bandit Camp (Wilderness)|Bandit Camp]] and Chaos Temple)
*Explorer Ring (Teleport to Port Sarim Docks, Mini-game Teleport to Rat Catchers or glory to [[Draynor Village]] works as well)
*Combat Bracelet, Skull sceptre, Amulet of Glory, Varrock teleport (To get to Edgeville Monastery)
*Slayer Ring, Salve graveyard teleport, Kharyrll Teleport, Ectophial, Fairy Ring code CKS (Slayer tower {{FloorNumber|uk=1}})
*Ring of Dueling (Ferox Enclave then run to Graveyard of Shadows)

{{Checklist|
*[[Rennard]] can be found at the [[Bandit Camp (Wilderness)]] near the shops. If you are having trouble speaking to him without getting attacked by the [[Bandit]]s, you can try to lure them into the nearby food store and shut the door. Once spoken to, he will give the [[Ghostly gloves]].
*[[Kharrim]] can be found at the [[Graveyard of Shadows]] ([[Carrallangar Teleport|Carrallangar]]), typically near the southern tomb within the graveyard. He will give the [[Ghostly boots]].
*[[Lennissa]] can be found at the [[Port Sarim]] docks at the [[Lady Lumbridge]]. Once spoken to, she will give the [[Ghostly robe (bottom)]].
*[[Dhalak]] can be found at the [[Edgeville Monastery]], upstairs by the altar (level 31 [[Prayer]] required). Once spoken to, he will give the [[Ghostly hood]].
*[[Viggora]] can be found at the [[Slayer Tower]] in [[Canifis]], on the {{FloorNumber|uk=1}} near the southeast stairwell by the entrance to the [[Infernal Mage]]s. Once spoken to, he will give the [[Ghostly cloak]].
}}

===Sequence 3===
''(Recommended items: A [[Shantay pass (item)|Shantay pass]], [[Falador]] teleport tabs or runes, [[Amulet of glory]] for teleporting to [[Al Kharid]] and [[Edgeville]], [[Burning amulet]] for teleporting to the Lava Maze, 200 coins for a carpet ride, slash weapon for Lava Maze) Note: Open the [[Muddy chest]] in the [[Lava Maze]] to complete a task in the [[Wilderness diary#Medium|medium Wilderness diary]] (requires Muddy Key).''

{{Checklist|
*[[Rennard]] can be found in the [[Bandit Camp (Kharidian Desert)]] in the bar on the western side of the camp. Note that players training here may be standing on the NPC. Once spoken to, he will give the [[Ghostly gloves]].
*[[Kharrim]] can be found at the end of the [[Lava Maze]] inside the second fenced in area. Bring a [[slash weapon]] or [[knife]] to cut through the webs. Once spoken to, he will give the [[Ghostly boots]].
*[[Lennissa]] can be found at the west side of [[Tree Gnome Stronghold]], directly south of the centre of the Gnome Ball Field along the outer edge of the fence. Once spoken to, she will give the [[Ghostly robe (bottom)]].
*[[Dhalak]] can be found at the [[Falador Party Room]], upstairs on the eastern side. Once spoken to, he will give the [[Ghostly hood]].
*[[Viggora]] can be found in the [[Edgeville Dungeon]] near the [[earth warrior]]s in the northernmost room. The earth warriors can be rather annoying, but with some luck, you can trap them behind the ghost with you on the other side; you must talk to Viggora as soon as this happens and click through the first dialogue window to make this effect permanent for the whole chat. Once spoken to, he will give the [[Ghostly cloak]].
}}

==Reward==
*[[Ghostly hood]]
*[[Ghostly robe (top)]]
*[[Ghostly robe (bottom)]]
*[[Ghostly gloves]]
*[[Ghostly boots]]
*[[Ghostly cloak]]

'''Upon completion, you can talk to [[Historian Minas]] on the {{FloorNumber|uk=1}} of the [[Varrock Museum]] to receive 10 [[kudos]] and an experience lamp worth 10,000 [[experience]] in any skill above 50.'''
[[File:Ghostly robes equipped.png|thumb|120px|A male player wearing the [[ghostly robes]].]]

==Required for completing==
Completion of Curse of the Empty Lord is required for the following:
* [[The General's Shadow]]

==Trivia==
*If you speak to any of the ghosts without a [[ghostspeak amulet]], you may say "All your base are belong to us", as well as some other quotes. These are references to famous translation errors in the game {{Wp|Zero Wing}}.
*When speaking to [[Rennard]], your player says "I ain't scared of no ghost," a reference to "I ain't afraid of no ghost" from the {{Wp|Ghostbusters}} theme song.
*While talking to [[Dhalak]], he will ask if you are the "mighty sorcerer that binds him". If you are level 99 [[Magic]], your character will respond by bragging about said [[skill mastery]].
*Talk to the first mysterious ghost at Glarial's tomb if you lose any of the ghostly item after quest.
*The ghosts located in Wilderness also appear in free-to-play worlds, as long as the player has the ring of visibility and ghostspeak amulet equipped; A player can still talk to them and receive pieces of the ghostly clothing, but it will be labeled as a [[members object]].
*You are able to speak to the three different ghosts of Rennard from the three sequences. If you talk to the wrong one, short and funny dialogues will occur with the ghost.

{{Curse of the Empty Lord}}
